verses.text: Do not keep silent, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God: hold not your peace, \w be|strong="H7892"\w* not still, God.
\w For|strong="H8252"\w* see! Your enemies roar, those who hate you lift up their heads,

laying crafty plans \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* people, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* plotting \w against|strong="H8130"\w* \w those|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* treasure.

‘\w Come|strong="H5971"\w*, let \w us|strong="H5921"\w* wipe \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w nation|strong="H5971"\w*, \w so|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w*’s name \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* mentioned no \w more|strong="H5921"\w*.’

\w For|strong="H8034"\w*, conspiring \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* accord, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* \w made|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* league \w against|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*
Tents \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Edom, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* Ishmaelites, Moab, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Hagrites.
Gebal \w and|strong="H4124"\w* Ammon \w and|strong="H4124"\w* Amalek, Philistia, with the people \w of|strong="H4124"\w* Tyre;
Syria, too, \w is|strong="H6002"\w* confederate, \w they|strong="H5983"\w* \w have|strong="H5973"\w* strengthened \w the|strong="H5973"\w* children \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Lot. \qs Selah\qs*

Deal \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* dealt \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Midian, \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Sisera, \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Jabin, \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* torrent \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Kishon,
\w who|strong="H1992"\w* \w at|strong="H6213"\w* Endor \w were|strong="H1992"\w* destroyed, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* became dung \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* field.

Make \w their|strong="H1961"\w* nobles \w like|strong="H1961"\w* Oreb \w and|strong="H1961"\w* Zeeb, all \w their|strong="H1961"\w* princes \w like|strong="H1961"\w* Zebah \w and|strong="H1961"\w* Zalmunna,
\w who|strong="H3605"\w* said, ‘Let us \w take|strong="H7896"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* ourselves \w the|strong="H3605"\w* meadows \w of|strong="H3605"\w* God.’
Whirl \w them|strong="H3423"\w*, \w my|strong="H3423"\w* God, like dust, like stubble before \w the|strong="H3423"\w* wind.

\w As|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fire \w that|strong="H7307"\w* kindles \w the|strong="H6440"\w* forest, \w as|strong="H6440"\w* flame \w that|strong="H7307"\w* \w sets|strong="H7896"\w* mountains ablaze,
so \w with|strong="H1197"\w* your tempest pursue \w them|strong="H3857"\w*, terrify \w them|strong="H3857"\w* \w with|strong="H1197"\w* your hurricane.
Make \w them|strong="H7291"\w* blush \w with|strong="H3651"\w* shame; until \w they|strong="H3651"\w* seek \w your|strong="H7291"\w* name, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*.
Everlasting \w shame|strong="H7036"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w confusion|strong="H7036"\w*, \w disgrace|strong="H7036"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* destruction \w be|strong="H3068"\w* theirs.
Teach those \w who|strong="H2659"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* alone are most high \w over|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* earth.
